item.description: The game is the biggest event of the year for sports betting platforms, nowadays thanks to Taylor Swift and her ability to attract a wide audience to ...

item.title: Starboard pushes an open door at Becton Dickinson as company seeks to separate its biosciences unit
item.description: Activist Starboard took a position in Becton Dickinson, calling for the company to sell its life sciences business. The company aims to do just that.

item.title: Hurry up and buy stocks like 'compelling' Nvidia ahead of earnings, Bank of America says
item.description: Bank of America said there's still plenty of quality buying opportunities ahead of next week's earnings reports.

item.title: Walgreens suspended its dividend. How investors can deal when stocks turn off the taps on income
item.description: Companies that cut or suspend dividends often give off warning signs before they take that step. Here's what it means for your portfolio.

item.title: This fintech could be about to pop, but this trade is not for the faint of heart, says Carter Worth
item.description: The chart analyst spotted some surprising past moves in Upstart.
